protein.specific_function: Stimulates the GTPase activity of tubulin, but does not enhance tubulin heterodimerization. Acts as guanine nucleotide dissociation inhibitor for ARL3

go_class.description: phosphotransferase activity, phosphate group as acceptor
nucleobase, nucleoside, nucleotide and nucleic acid metabolic process
nucleobase, nucleoside and nucleotide metabolic process
